name: Citadale - Legacy of Fate
description:
Good things come in threes...

Rhogul, lord of darkness and prince of the night has finally regained his strength, after the devastating defeat at the hands of Gabriel Dorleac. But he will soon be met with force by Christopher, adopted son of Gabriel and heir to the legendary Shadow Blade, the one sword able to cut through the darkness. Can you survive all the traps, monsters and secrets once more?

- Six stages, bigger, longer, better!
- New gameplay elements and upgrades
- Retro visuals and chiptune music
- More, deeper story and lore

This game is included in 'Citadale - The Legends Trilogy'
